expo.name: Recipe Meals App
expo.description:
An mobile application for iOS/Android devices that allows the user to search for and find delicious recipes to make! Made from following a React Native Course where the objective of this application was to learn React Navigation, passing of data between screens, and Redux.

Features include:
Find recipes based on categories
Filtering recipes based on criteria such as lactose free, vegan, etc.
Saving recipes to a favorites list to be viewed in a separate tab

Source: Part of the coursework from Udemy's "React Native- The Practical Guide 2021 Edition" by Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller
